properties.name: custom.system.earth.position.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial position of the Earth.

properties.name: custom.system.earth.position.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial position of the Earth.

properties.name: custom.system.earth.velocity.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial velocity of the Earth.

properties.name: custom.system.earth.velocity.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial velocity of the Earth.

properties.name: custom.system.earth.acceleration.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial acceleration of the Earth.

properties.name: custom.system.earth.acceleration.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial acceleration of the Earth.

properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial velocity of Jupiter.

properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial acceleration of Jupiter.

properties.name: custom.simulation.time-step
properties.description: The time step (i.e how much time elapses in one simulation step).

properties.name: custom.simulation.duration
properties.description: The duration of the simulation (in seconds).

properties.description: The path for the raw file.

properties.description: The path for the Ovito file.
